document: <sentence id="s1" text="We show that maternal extracellular matrix organization variants have a significant genome-wide interaction with maternal pre-pregnancy overweight/obesity on regulation of alternative mRNA splicing, via spliceosome risk, with rs11161721 (PG × E=1.8 × 10-8; empirical PG × E=1.2 × 10-8) as the top hit.">
